businessName.description: What will you name your business?

municipality.placeholder: Type in the name of your town (i.e Newark, Jersey City, etc)
municipality.description:
Where in New Jersey will your first location be? 

**\*Note:** Unincorporated communities are not listed here. You can find your official jurisdiction by [doing a search](https://www.nj.gov/nj/gov/county/localities.html) (you will type in your community into the local name field).*

legalStructureId.placeholder: Select a legal structure for your Navigator profile.
legalStructureId.header: Which Legal Structure Will You Choose?
legalStructureId.description:
Your businessâ€™ `legal structure|legal-structure-learn-more` can have a large impact on taxes, financing, liability, and closure of your business. We strongly suggest doing research on the best legal structure for your business.  
Select a legal structure for your Navigator profile below. Making a selection will not form your business, it will help us create your personalized guide. You can change your intended legal structure anytime before formally filing it with the NJ Department of Treasury.

industryId.description: Which industry best describes your business?

sectorId.description: Which sector best describes your business?

existingEmployees.description: If you have no employees right now enter 0. You can change this as you add employees.

ownershipTypeIds.description: At least 51% of my business is owned and controlled by (select all that apply):
